plurals.name: delete_files_question
plurals.item: Do you want to delete this file?
Do you want to delete %d files?

resources.string: uprotocol is an open content sharing protocol letting different types of software to communicate and share content. It is secure by default and comes with a consistent set of APIs.\n\nAs a developer, you can set it up easily and add content-sharing functionality to your app!
This client uses a version that is no longer supported!
Invalidate \"%s\"\'s certificate to communicate with it.

Share something from the app first.

1- Open Wi-Fi settings. 

2- Wait until "%s" appears on the Wi-Fi list. 

3- Pick it (%s) and paste the password (%s). 

4- Return here after connecting.
Needs permission to modify system settings
